abstract: The new service would place product ads on any video on the site, like product reviews uploaded by amateur reviewers, provided the clip’s owner opts in.
snippet: The new service would place product ads on any video on the site, like product reviews uploaded by amateur reviewers, provided the clip’s owner opts in.
lead_paragraph: YouTube announced on Tuesday that it would introduce shopping ads on its videos that let viewers jump directly to retailers’ websites and buy the products featured in the clips.

headline.main: YouTube to Expand Shopping Links to More Videos
headline.print_headline: YouTube to Expand Retail Links on Videos
